data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring chronology of Picea engelmannii (Engelmann spruce) compiled from tree samples BITTER
Exposition W, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Granit Moraenenschutt, Tree line 2540 m, av. Tree height 28 m, Tree cover 75%, Shrub cover 35%, Herb cover 75%, Vegatation type: Homogen, Film number: 747A
